parts.text: {"word":"gook","priority":"★☆☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(侮辱的) 外国人、特にアジア人に対する蔑称","english_definition":"(offensive) a derogatory term for a foreigner, especially one of Asian descent.","examples":[{"sentence":"He was called a gook because of his ethnicity.","translation":"彼は民族的出自のせいで「gook」と呼ばれた。"},{"sentence":"The term 'gook' is considered a racial slur.","translation":"「gook」という言葉は人種的侮辱とみなされる。"}],"collocations":[],"synonyms":["chink","slope","slant-eye","yellow","foreigner (offensive)"],"antonyms":[],"usage_notes":{"explanation":"This term is highly offensive and should never be used. It is a racial slur used to denigrate people, particularly those of Asian descent. Using this word can have serious consequences and is considered hate speech.","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{},"related_words":{},"level_frequency":{"frequency_google_ngram":"Low frequency - This term is rarely used in modern, respectful discourse.","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C2","text":"The word 'gook' is a highly offensive racial slur. Its inclusion in a dictionary is solely for informational purposes to explain its meaning and harmful nature.","warning":"This word is extremely offensive and should never be used."}, "example_sentences":[{"sentence":"(Never use) He called the Vietnamese soldier a gook.","translation":"(絶対に使用しないでください) 彼はベトナム兵を「gook」と呼んだ。","type":"offensive","meaning_category":"racial slur"}]}
